title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: How much knowledge do you need to achieve your Bitcoin goals in 2023? My answer is just enough knowledge to get you started. You will figure the rest out on the way because as someone rightly said, you cannot learn how to drive in a parked car. As a newbie getting knowledge of Bitcoin is as important as where you are getting the knowledge. So, look in the right place. Also,  your time is important do not waste it on some dumb stuff of temporary value. In your quest for knowledge, avoid procrastinating. Lastly, remember that with Bitcoin, where you live doesn't determine how much you'll make. Take action and take it now.

In your quest for knowledge, avoid procrastinating.Good idea, dont be too timid to learning new things and be reserved by not been too forward, don't always assume you know everything, anyone trying to waste your time is not worth being with you at all, also deals with laziness because that's what introduces procrastination.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: That is a bold statement for newbies in this forum who hesitate to get into bitcoin or cryptocurrencies. I have so many friends who heard about bitcoin before 2015 and didn't get involved and now they regret their hesitation or lack of decision-making. On the other hand many get involved in cryptocurrency later and get their reward for taking the right decision in time. I think when any opportunity comes and you see the potential in it, you have to dive deep and get your research done and take the right decision in time.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: Bitcoin is not rocket science, you don't need to learn everything about it to "succeed", if you are an investor, you just have to not sell at a loss and hope for eventual profit, if you are earning Bitcoin through some job, just keep getting better at the job.In Bitcoin it's more important to learn not what to do, but what to not do - as there's a lot of potential mistakes to make that can easily cost you your coins. Like storing coins on an exchange, falling for a scam, getting your coins stolen by malware.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: A newbie should not be pressured to take any action and if they must get their hands into the game, then they should do with a much reduced amount to learn how to create a wallet and back it up. They should also test out with small transactions to learn how to send securely. Other experiments like sending on an airgapped device which involves operating on two devices and also using a hardware wallet.After familiarizing with the basics, they decide when to invest and how they want to do that.- Jay -

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: Good write up. I heard about bitcoin in 2015 and since then, I've learnt a lot. The truth is we keep knowing more everyday as people keep making different kinds of use cases and developments for bitcoin. There is so much to come as time goes. And For now, Im learning about some new developments Bitcoin OGs have made on Bitcoin to make it easy for humanity to use.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on March 11, 2023, 04:42:31 PMHow much knowledge do you need to achieve your Bitcoin goals in 2023? Basic knowledge is more important than other things. Many newbies don't want to know about that and just want to succeed and got a big profit. An example of basic knowledge is a non-custody wallet, before continuing to another thing, a newbie must know how to keep the private key because it's useless to succeed if all funds are on exchange wallets which at any time taken away from the exchange owner.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Dreams is about a long term purpose, at least next few years, but you're only discuss about goals in this year. It's not a dreams when you're only discuss for one year. If you only hold Bitcoin for a year, you either don't make money or you only make a little profit. Just stay focus to make money in your real jobs, learn about a new thing that will boost you to earn more money and make sure you convert most of your money into Bitcoin using DCA strategy.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Dreams isnt supposedly be relied on bitcoin right? Its only an instrument that we can use to make our dreams succesful. We should be cautious on the crypto journey since its a risky kind of thing when it comes to investment. How often people loss their money here? A lot but of course we should not be scared when it comes to risking something cause no one get high gains or profits without risking something.Learning bitcoin isnt hard so slowly you can adopt to it. But dont do that for money alone, learn the system and benefit from it.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: It depends on what you consider success. Is a person successful by knowing the technical features of Bitcoin and how everything works and fits in the background? Sure, I would say they are. But what if that person never had any money to invest, was afraid to do it, or didn't acquire enough? On the other hand, a person on the opposite side of the world heard about if 10 years ago, invested some money, and is now a millionaire. They don't know anything about bitcoin, they don't care what problems it solves, but they have 100 times the wealth that the knowledgeable person made. I think most people would rather be the second guy. So it's a combination of knowledge, risk, and having the financial means to back you.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: If you dream of changing your life with bitcoins, you must have basic knowledge about using bitcoins. To have that knowledge, we must study hard to find ways or methods that work for us. Each person will use a different way to achieve their goals; only by learning can you find a way.Maybe it looks very boring because every day you have to learn more. But that's what we all must do: enjoy the process and not complain if we feel bored. If we feel tired while studying, we should rest for a while before starting again because by taking a break, we refresh our minds to receive more lessons.

comments.body: everything takes time, targeting a goal for a year will only put pressure to oneself and make bad decission, remember , pressure makes more mistakes, i suggest to take it slowly, since we cannot predict once destiny, i remember someone told me that it takes years to learn a skills, and its true , success is not achieve overnight it needs time sacrifices along the way mistakes to reach those goals.

Take action and take it now.That's right, you need to try to find out in the process of using cryptocurrencies. You can't just read the information. The law of the correlation of theory and practice says that for 70 percent of practice you need to study 30 percent of theory. This happens because practice without theory is blind. This is the world of cryptocurrencies, it is interesting and changeable, but in the brave and persistent there are many rewards in it.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: You can't do without foolishness. Getting to know bitcoin will in any case be accompanied by some mistakes. Some will be stupid and some will be very stupid, but all of this will shape your personal experience and your personal knowledge of cryptocurrencies and bitcoin. Learning without experience with mistakes and stupid decisions won't work, although you should strive for that, but don't be intimidated by the fact that you did something wrong. In cryptocurrency, the best and most reliable knowledge is always obtained only through your own mistakes.

comments.author: Jon_Hodl
comments.body: IMHO, there are only a few steps to achieving a high level of bitcoin skill. 1. Stack sats2. Secure your seed phrase3. control your private keys and self custody your satsThat is what you need to do in order achieve 90% of any financial goals in bitcoin. If you want to go a step further and secure your own privacy, then running your own node is an obvious next step. QuoteLastly, remember that with Bitcoin, where you live doesn't determine how much you'll make. Take action and take it now.Yup. Bitcoin is one of the only opportunities that the working class have the opportunity to front run the ruling class.

comments.body: Of course it takes a long journey to reach the current goal in 2023, it's not easy actually how we go through several phases including losses in it but most likely my dream in bitcoin is certainly bigger because I think if I save more bitcoins during the process that then I'd say it works as planned, but I started from a small knowledge but as time goes by about the technology and other features I have understood what we can do now.But we don't have too much hope in cryptocurrency, this is high volatility, we can be successful even because we learn from previous experiences, we must have the discipline to maintain carelessness in the stupid things we do and continue to learn from others because it will be an important experience for you and myself.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on March 11, 2023, 04:42:31 PMHow much knowledge do you need to achieve your Bitcoin goals in 2023? We always emphasizing on how to have a palm-full knowledge in making profits with bitcoin as an ultimate goal but I'll diversify from that school of thought for now by saying that traders and investors should focus more on gaining the knowledge of not falling into victim of loosing the Bitcoin they already have even as they thrive to accumulate profits. Getting the knowledge that helps you discern when a certain proposal is a scam scheme, or a certain investment decision may not grow some fruition and how to avoid. This way, you can guide against loosing the bitcoin which you already have while in your quest to achieve more. Like they say, "a bird at hand is better than a thousand in the bush".
